term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - stoichiometric mean molal (practical activity coefficient), in electrochemistry
term.title: stoichiometric mean molal

item.text: The practical activity coefficient of electrolyte B is given by γ ± = a ± ν + ν + ν- ν- m B m is the mean activity of B in solution, m B is the molality of B, m + = 1 mol kg-1, ν + is the number of cations and ν- the number of anions in the chosen group B which is taken as the electrolyte.

item.alttext: γ ± = a ± ν + ν + ν- ν- m B m
